menuitem.name: _Form Variables
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && (dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html' && dw.getDocumentDOM().documentType == 'PHP_MySQL')
